src:
V Veliki Pristavi zagorelo gospodarsko poslopje
05 Nov 2019, 12:28 by Spletno uredništvo

Zjutraj je v vasi Velika Pristava zagorelo gospodarsko poslopje. Zagorelo naj bi seno. Požar so gasilci pogasili, prizorišče požara pa si bodo ogledali tudi kriminalisti. Po prvih ocenah gmotna škoda znaša približno 70.000 evrov, so sporočili s Policijske uprave Koper.



Fotografija je simbolična. Foto: Andraž Gombač

PRIMORSKA > Koprski policisti so danes prejeli prijavo, da je izginilo vozilo znamke ford, tip tourneo connect 1.8. z registrsko številko KP E7-359. Parkirano je bilo na vrhu garažne hiše na Markovcu v Kopru, vredno pa je 2000 evrov.
Vlomilci na Ravbarkomandi
Včeraj zvečer so neznanci vlomili v podjetje na Ravbarkomandi. Oškodovanec, ki je prvi prišel na kraj, jih je pregnal. Pred tem so že s treh osebnih rabljenih vozil odrezali katalizatorje, še več pa iz delavnice. Preden so pobegnili, so uspeli odnesti dva katalizatorja. Policisti zbirajo informacije.
Večkrat trčil v betonsko varovalno ograjo
Ajdovski policisti so včeraj okoli 23. ure obravnavali prometno nesrečo na hitri cesti med Ajdovščino in Vipavo, kjer je 30-letni voznik osebnega avtomobila trčil v varnostno ograjo. Ugotovili so, da se je prometna nesreča zgodila zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti voznika osebnega avtomobila znamke mercedes-benz, ki je na voznem pasu zaradi vode na cestišču izgubil nadzor nad vozilom in večkrat trčil v betonsko varovalno ograjo na levi strani prehitevalnega pasu.
Voznik se k sreči ni poškodoval. Policisti so mu izdali plačilni nalog.
Trčil v črpalko za točenje goriva
Prometni policisti so včeraj okoli 19. ure prihiteli na bencinski servis na hitri cesti v Vrtojbi. 49-letni voznik tovornega vozila, državljan Ukrajine, je namreč zaradi nepravilnega premika z vozilom trčil v črpalko za točenje goriva. Tudi njemu so policisti izdali globo.
text:
A commercial building burned down in Velika Pristava
05 Nov 2019, 12:28 by Web Editing

In the morning, an outbuilding was burned down in the village of Velika Pristava. It's supposed to burn hay. The fire was extinguished by the fire, and the scene will also be viewed by criminals. According to initial estimates, the property damage amounts to about 70,000 euros, according to the Koper Police Directorate.



Photography is symbolic. Photo: Andraž Gombač

PRIMORSKA> Police officers from Koper today received a report that a Ford car, type tourneo connect 1.8, has disappeared. with registration number KP E7-359. It was parked at the top of a garage in Markovac in Koper and is worth EUR 2,000.
Burglars at Ravbarkomanda
Last night, strangers broke into a business on Ravbarkomanda. The injured party who came to the place first pursued them. Previously, catalysts were cut off from three used cars, and even more from the workshop. Before fleeing, they were able to pull off two catalysts. Police officers gather information.
He repeatedly collided with a concrete guardrail
Yesterday, around 23 o'clock, Ajdovsko police officers dealt with a traffic accident on a highway between Ajdovščina and Vipava, where a 30-year-old passenger car collided with a security fence. It was determined that the car accident was due to unadjusted speed of a Mercedes-Benz passenger car driver who lost control of the vehicle on the lane due to water on the roadway and repeatedly collided with a concrete guardrail on the left side of the overpass.
Fortunately, the driver was not injured. The police officers issued him a warrant of payment.
I ran into the fuel pump
Traffic police arrived at a gas station on the expressway in Vrtojba around 7 pm yesterday. A 49-year-old truck driver, a Ukrainian citizen, collided with a vehicle at a fuel pump due to improper movement with a vehicle. The police also issued him a fine.
